turn.2: Elankadai  Elankadai is a well populated area about 3 km from the Nagercoil town in Kanyakumari district.
turn.4: It is located on the KanyaKumari State way via Manakkudy and about 18 km from the beach of Kanyakumari, 5 km from Chothavilai Beach and 10 km from Chankuthurai Beach.
